author: Joyston Monteiro
description: A flavorful and quick stir-fried rice dish made with cooked rice, vegetables, soy sauce, and spices — perfect for lunch or dinner.
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice (preferably a day old)
1/2 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, peas, corn)
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Scramble the eggs, then remove and set aside.
Add onions and sauté until translucent.
Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Add cooked rice, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Toss everything well and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add the scrambled eggs back, mix well, and garnish with chopped spring onions.
